comment: * The ALLOW_ALL HostnameVerifier essentially turns hostname verification * off. This implementation is a no-op, and never throws the SSLException. * * @author Julius Davies * * @deprecated Please use {@link java.net.URL#openConnection} instead. * Please visit this webpage * for further details.
